cleaning0.label: Move to end and hide selected slides
cleaning0.supertip: Moves the selected slides to the end of the presentation and hides them from the slideshow

cleaning10.label: Add page numbers to all/selected slides (except the first)
cleaning10.supertip: Adds page numbers to the selected slides or the entire presentation, skipping the first slide

cleaning1.label: Remove animations from all/selected slides
cleaning1.supertip: Removes all animations from the selected slides or from the entire presentation

cleaning2.label: Remove entry transitions from all/selected slides
cleaning2.supertip: Removes entry transitions from the selected slides or from the entire presentation

cleaning3.label: Remove speaker notes from all/selected slides
cleaning3.supertip: Removes speaker notes from the selected slides or from the entire presentation

cleaning4.label: Remove comments from all/selected slides
cleaning4.supertip: Removes comments from the selected slides or from the entire presentation

cleaning5.label: Remove all unused master slides
cleaning5.supertip: Removes all master slides that are not used by any slide in the presentation

cleaning6.label: Remove all hidden slides
cleaning6.supertip: Removes all hidden slides from the presentation

cleaning7.label: Convert all/selected slides to pictures (readonly)
cleaning7.supertip: Converts the selected slides or the entire presentation into readonly picture slides

cleaning8.label: Watermark and then convert all/selected slides to pictures (readonly)
cleaning8.supertip: Adds a watermark to the selected slides or the entire presentation and then converts them into readonly picture slides

cleaning9.label: Anonymize all/selected slides with Lorem Ipsum
cleaning9.supertip: Replaces text on the selected slides or the entire presentation with Lorem Ipsum to anonymize content

CleaningMenu.label: Cleaning tools
CleaningMenu.supertip: Opens the tools for cleaning and fixing common slide issues

ReplaceColorsShapesButton.supertip: Replaces colors in the selected shapes

ReplaceColorsButton.label: Replace colors in all/selected slides

ReplaceColorsMenu.supertip: Opens the tools for replacing colors in slides or shapes

ShowFormManageTagsButton.label: Manage hidden tags to shapes or slides
ShowFormManageTagsButton.supertip: Manages the hidden tags applied to shapes or slides

ShowTagsOnSlide.label: Show slidetags on all slides
ShowTagsOnSlide.supertip: Shows the hidden tags on all slides

ManualMailMerge.supertip: Replaces all merge fields on all slides using manually entered values
